questions.question: What did the activists who founded Greenpeace originally call themselves?
feedback: Not really, they were called the Don't make a wave comitee. The Don't Make a Wave Committee was founded to halt further underground nuclear testing by the United States in Amchitka.
All right sparky. Don't boast yourself there is still plenty of question to go.

questions.question: In which year was Greenpeace founded?
feedback: Not really, Greenpeace was founded in 1971. Wasn't this in your history book? Right, maybe not. At least it's in ours.
That's right. I know it would have been much cooler if it have been founded in 1968. As a baby of the summer of love or something.

gameover.text: Oh boy, let's try again and pretend this never happened!

gameover.text: Not too bad sparky, but you could use a little bit of cheating!
gameover.social: I scored 1/2 in Greenpeace test here, you think you can non-violently beat this? http://www.greenpeace.org

gameover.text: Very impressive matey! Come sail with us next time!
